verses.name: Jeremiah 19:8
verses.text: And I will make this city desolate, and an hissing; every one that passeth thereby shall be astonished and hiss because of all the plagues thereof.

verses.name: Jeremiah 19:9
verses.text: And I will cause them to eat the flesh of their sons and the flesh of their daughters, and they shall eat every one the flesh of his friend in the siege and straitness, wherewith their enemies, and they that seek their lives, shall straiten them.

verses.name: Jeremiah 19:10
verses.text: Then shalt thou break the bottle in the sight of the men that go with thee,
